attributes.action: publically acknowledge that his Government has grossly betrayed the British people by allowing their private and personal information to be lost, and make amends by dissolving the government forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Title says it all.
This is quite simply the worst betrayal of the confidentiality of the ordinary working people of this country in living memory.  One hundred years ago, those responsible would have retired to their drawing room with a loaded pistol to do what was expected. Today, the Senior Civil Servant is allowed to simply resign?  He should be in gaol.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
